lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. player Alonzo Spellman was arrested Tuesday in Tulsa, Okla., after a nearly 20-minute chase in which police fired pepper-spray pellets into his car. His bond was set at $10,700, and Spellman remained jailed early Tuesday evening. Spellman played nine seasons in the N.F.L. for the Chicago Bears, the Detroit Lions and the Dallas Cowboys.
